page.title: 17Carlton Towers Estate
page.content: Carlton Towers Estate consists of more than 2OOO acres, 2 of which are ornamental gardens. One full time gardener caters for the gardens. 4OOO roses,2OOO bedding plants and rhododendrons are part of the greenery. lOOO trees of both soft and hardwood have been planted this year. Farmland is used for dairy farming and to grow wheat and sugar beet. The remainder of the ground is parkland used for camping and other social events. The flower beds in the ornamental gardens are in shapes of x's, y's and d's and,according to the gardener,they have been there since the turn of the century. Nearby stands a decaying pavillion from where the tennis was viewed. Trees are now growing in place of the tennis court.
